content:
Not sure if this behaviour is intentional or not ....?

Organization settings / New users restricted to domain = false: login page is fine, shows org name, description, logo etc.
Organization settings / New users restricted to domain = true: login page is a simple login page with no org info on it, I.E. just email/password.

I need to be able to restrict logins to applicable domains but also show the org info. Is this possible?
that sounds like a bug; can you open an issue? Those shouldn't be coupled.
